  # ***** START DEFINING PACKAGES FOR ANACONDA ***
  # DO NOT EDIT BY HAND: Update the generate_cloud_init_conda_package_specs.sh script and run it to re-generate this section in could_init_conda_package_specs.txt

  # Explicitly requested packages
  - export PYALLREQUESTEDPACKAGES="ipykernel jupyter_client jupyterlab keras notebook pandas pandas-datareader pandas-profiling pandasql plotly spacy pystan pytorch r-irkernel scikit-image scikit-learn tensorflow torchvision"
  - export PY27REQUESTEDPACKAGES="monocle"
  - export PY35REQUESTEDPACKAGES="jupyterhub jupyterhub-ldapauthenticator"
  - export PY36REQUESTEDPACKAGES="jupyterhub jupyterhub-ldapauthenticator"

  # Anaconda "In installer" packages

  # Azure DSVM conda packages
  - export PYALLDSVM_PACKAGES="asn1crypto attrs blas bleach ca-certificates certifi cffi chardet colorama contextlib2 cryptography cycler cython dbus decorator entrypoints expat filelock fontconfig freetype glib gmp gst-plugins-base gstreamer html5lib icu idna intel-openmp ipykernel ipython ipython_genutils ipywidgets jedi jinja2 jmespath jpeg jsonschema jupyter_client jupyter_core kiwisolver libedit libffi libgcc-ng libgfortran-ng libpng libsodium libstdcxx-ng libtiff libxcb libxml2 markupsafe matplotlib mistune mkl mkl_fft mkl_random nbconvert nbformat ncurses notebook numpy numpy numpy-base olefile openssl pandas pandoc pandocfilters parso pcre pexpect pickleshare pillow pip prompt_toolkit protobuf ptyprocess pycparser pygments pyopenssl pyparsing pyqt python python-dateutil pytz pyzmq qt readline requests scikit-learn scipy send2trash setuptools simplegeneric sip six sqlite terminado testpath tk tornado traitlets typing urllib3 wcwidth webencodings wheel widgetsnbextension xz zeromq zlib "

  - export PY36DSVM_PACKAGES="absl-py adal antlr4-python3-runtime appdirs applicationinsights argcomplete astor automat azure-cli-command-modules-nspkg azure-cli-core azure-cli-nspkg azure-cli-profile azure-cli-telemetry azure-common azure-graphrbac azure-mgmt-authorization azure-mgmt-containerregistry azure-mgmt-keyvault azure-mgmt-nspkg azure-mgmt-resource azure-mgmt-storage azure-nspkg azure-storage-blob azure-storage-common azure-storage-nspkg azureml-contrib-brainwave azureml-contrib-explain-model azureml-contrib-run azureml-contrib-server azureml-contrib-tensorboard azureml-core azureml-pipeline azureml-pipeline-core azureml-pipeline-steps azureml-sdk azureml-telemetry azureml-train azureml-train-automl azureml-train-core azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive azureml-train-widgets backcall backports.tempfile backports.weakref bcrypt chainer constantly cudatoolkit cudnn docker docker-pycreds gast grpcio horovod humanfriendly hyperlink incremental isodate joblib JsonForm jsonpickle JsonSir Keras knack libuuid lightgbm Markdown msrest msrestazure nb_conda nb_conda_kernels nccl ndg-httpsclient ninja oauthlib onnx onnx-chainer onnxmltools onnxruntime paramiko pathspec portalocker prometheus_client pyasn1 pyasn1-modules PyJWT PyNaCl Python-EasyConfig pytorch PyYAML requests-oauthlib Resource ruamel.yaml SecretStorage service_identity setuptools shap sklearn-pandas tabulate tensorboard tensorflow-gpu termcolor torchvision tqdm twisted typing-extensions websocket-client Werkzeug wheel zope zope.interface "

  # Consolidate package lists for each Python version
  - export PYTHON27PACKAGES="$PYALLREQUESTEDPACKAGES $PY27REQUESTEDPACKAGES $PYALLANACONDAPACKAGES $PY27ANACONDAPACKAGES $PYALLDSVM_PACKAGES $PY27DSVM_PACKAGES"
  - export PYTHON35PACKAGES="$PYALLREQUESTEDPACKAGES $PY35REQUESTEDPACKAGES $PYALLANACONDAPACKAGES $PY35ANACONDAPACKAGES $PYALLDSVM_PACKAGES $PY35DSVM_PACKAGES"
  - export PYTHON36PACKAGES="$PYALLREQUESTEDPACKAGES $PY36REQUESTEDPACKAGES $PYALLANACONDAPACKAGES $PY36ANACONDAPACKAGES $PYALLDSVM_PACKAGES $PY36DSVM_PACKAGES"
  # ***** END DEFINING PACKAGES FOR ANACONDA ***
